title: Choral Music Pack
description: A choir based, 10 track Music Pack
longDescription:
Listen to the demos!


Choral Music Pack is a choir based, 10 track Music Pack. It offers a wide range of emotions; from soft and ominous, and intense, action oriented ones as well.

It was written for four section choir (soprano, alto, tenor and bass). It was created with adventure games in mind, specifically for temples and any fictitious religion themes.


It includes 10 tracks, with five additional edits per track, for a total of 60 music files.

The additional edits include a loop version, 2 bumpers that might be useful as transition or musical sfx, an ending edit and a short loop for short duration screens.

All the music files are .wav 44.1kHz, 16 bits.


Track list:


A Place for Prayers (01:32)

Battle Hymn (01:42)

Chant of the Forgotten (01:10)

Dreams of Hope (01:54)

Glory of Civilization (01:17)

Halls of Light (01:30)

Sanctuary of Souls (01:53)

Self-revealing (01:39)

Song of Remembrance (01:41)

Tense Chants (01:00)
technicalDetails:
Features:

  •  10 high quality choral tracks
  •  Five additional edits for each track.
  •  

Number of Audio Wavs: 60

Number of Audio Cues: 60

Sample rate / bit rate: 44.1 kHz / 16 bit

Does music loop: YES

Minutes of audio provided: 34:50 (including all edits)

Supported Development Platforms:

Windows: Yes

Mac: Tes
